resources.string:
"This is the new Android App Launcher v 1.0 Beta.

"
" This app creates a virtual environment where the user can organize and launch their installed " "apps. Unlike the traditional Android Launcher where the entire phone's layout is changed, " " this app provides a safe environment where users can test out new layouts and styles without " "the overwhelming changes that the Android Launchers brings. Furtheremore, this app serves as " "a secondary iOS/Android desktop, similar to virtual machines in PCs. It's essentially an app " "that contains more apps. It also allows the user to drag and drop icons simlar to a regular " "desktop. As a result, this app strives to provide the best user experience possible, by providing " "great functionality, along with animations and motions that enhance the overall experience.

"
" This product also provides a feature that displays information about each app. In the future," "there will be features that give the user the freedom to customize icons, wall papers, ringtones" "and more.

" " Thank you for installing and we hope that you can experience all the features that our " "product has to offer! We're always open to suggestions on possible future improvements, so if you have any questions " "or comments, send us a message via Email and we'll try to get back to you within a reasonable time frame.

"
" Also one more thing, don't forget to spread the word to all your friends and don't forget to also try our other products " "in our appstore!/n/n"
